name: Tree of Growth
description:
Inspired by L-systems, known for their flexible and customizable descriptions of recursive patterns, Tree of Growth is an interactive projection that brings the art of tree planting to life. The installation invites participants to plant and grow their own unique trees in a virtual garden, simply by positioning a red box on the floor. Every tree is distinct, reflecting nature’s diversity, powered by recursive mathematical rules.
This is a collaboration between Fuguo Xue and Jinyuan Liu.
media: interactive projection built with Max MSP, and a block made with woodboard and acrylic paint.

name: The Surface City
description:
The Surface City is a concept design and storytelling experience enhanced by creative coding. It aims to explore the patterns of cities with code and the potential of 2D tiles in creating 3D visual effects.
The Surface City is a collaboration between Fuguo and Chenyi. It is part of the Visible Cities: Workshop Exhibition organized by CritLab Review.
media: generative landscape done by p5.js coding and Adobe Illustrator.

name: WildWeb
description:
WildWeb is an interactive installation that visualizes the recording of people’s digital and physical footprints in this era of pervasive information technology, and how technology digests the data to generate endless content.
This installation was designed and developed by me and Sauda Musharrat.
media: physical settings powered by Arduino and real-time data processing with Max MSP.

name: AquaMetropolis
description: AquaMetropolis: A Submerged Cyberpunk Odyssey is a short fictional film produced with Generative AI by Fuguo Xue that transports viewers into a mesmerizing undersea world. In this visionary future, humanity has adapted to life beneath the waves as sea levels rise. While the city appears harmonious, the film subtly reveals the profound vulnerability and awe that humans experience when faced with the relentless power of the natural world.
media: GenAI for art, animation, and audio.

name: Cometale
description:
Cometale is an interactive installation that creates a unique and engaging experience, highlighting the interconnectedness of history and nature by combining ancient and modern elements. By developing this installation, I hope to offer visitors a chance to reflect on the historical events, and how they continue to shape our understanding of the world around us today.
Cometale was featured at the Ars Electronica Festival 2023 Campus Exhibition.
media: GenAI for art and animation, and TouchDesigner for real-time interactions with the projection.

name: Earthlings
description:
Earthlings is a two-player 2.5D environment game that promotes ecological awareness by encouraging cooperation in the game. By developing this game, we hope to prompt our players to think about the relationship between humans and nature.
I contributed to this game in terms of game conception, game programming, and art assets creation.
Our team of 3 (Fuguo Xue, Xinying Guo, and Yaoxuan Wang) presented this game at The International Conference of Undergraduate Research 2022 (ICUR 2022).
media: game experience built with Unity3D, Aseprite, and Mental Canvas.

name: Cat Jazz
description: Cat Jazz is an experimental animation that combines jazz music and abstract animation to present the imagery of cats. Different from traditional animation's reliance on concrete characters, this experimental animation uses the automatic audio-visual synchronization mechanism of the human brain to complete the storytelling.
media: experimental animation created with Adobe After Effects.
